column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////HI Rachel - Thank you very much for the awesome review. We also appreciate your patience with our extended-wait times during peak hours. I also appreciate your constructive criticism: We are constantly working hard to keep the flow of our restaurant as casual and relaxed as possible. As you might imagine
column2: when there are dozens of people waiting for tables
column3: tensions tend to rise and we find ourselves trying to move as quickly as possible but without rushing people along. It's no easy task
column5: we are constantly working to achieve a perfect balance.
